content.html: It irks me when men only discover women's equality after they become dads to little girls, and I formed my views on abortion long ago, but at the same time: When I tucked my kids in tonight, I felt extra pissed about living in a state where my daughter is less free than my son.
content.value:
It irks me when men only discover women's equality after they become dads to little girls, and I formed my views on abortion long ago, but at the same time: 

When I tucked my kids in tonight, I felt extra pissed about living in a state where my daughter is less free than my son.
